insect.junit
Class JUnitDriver

java.lang.Object
  jaba.main.JABADriver
      insect.junit.JUnitDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class JUnitDriver
extends jaba.main.JABADriver

JUnitDriver.java Provided a JABA resource file consisting of program classes as well as JUnit TestCase classes for that program, this driver utiltizes InsECT to instrument the program classes and execute the JUnit Test Cases. Classes that implement junit.framework.Test are assumed to be the test case classes. Created: Sat Nov 09 14:58:11 2002

Author:
Anil Chawla
See Also:
